properties.name: application.presence.touch-throttle
properties.description: Minimum time between DB updates of lastActiveAt for a user.

properties.name: application.presence.online-window
properties.description: How recent lastActiveAt must be to consider a user online.

properties.name: application.login.attempts.threshold
properties.description: Failed login attempts before blocking the user.

properties.name: application.login.block.expiry
properties.description: How long the user remains blocked after too many failed attempts.

properties.name: application.login.password.placeholder
properties.description: String used when masking passwords in logs or DTOs.
